Question: The interior of the memorial includes a 19-foot (6 m) statue of this person and engravings of passages from his writings.
Hints: During his nineteen-day voyage en route to France **** taught himself how to read and write Spanish.
This person believed that political success at home depended on the success of the French army in Europe.
While **** resented the changes, he did not speak publicly about the revisions.
